description:
"Mahjong Solitaire" is a <Matching Puzzle> game of Mahjong tiles.

★You do not need any knowledge about Mahjong, you just combine same design tiles!!
★Contains 256 abundant stages!!
★Enjoy the rhythm of removing tiles with Match type<Drag> which has introduced anew!!
 (You can of course enjoy with conventional Click type too!)
★Included arrangement of arcade version "Shanghai I", "Shanghai II" and "Shanghai III" too!!
★Able to select difficulty as you like!

Won't you enjoy using brain and be healed with first series of Mahjong Solitaire with theme of water?
name: Mahjong Solitaire Refresh
